identity.name: PowerLeave
identity.description: The modern leave management platform for Italian SMBs.

layout_strategies.dashboard: Bento Grid: mix of 1x1, 2x1, and 2x2 widgets. Use 'grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-4'
layout_strategies.landing_page: High contrast sections. Alternating white and light gray backgrounds. Large typography.
layout_strategies.forms: Single column on mobile, two columns on desktop for long forms. Labels above inputs.

components.buttons: Pill-shaped or rounded-md. Primary: Deep Teal. Secondary: Outline or Ghost.
components.cards: Clean white background, subtle border, minimal shadow. Hover: lift slightly.
components.navigation: Sidebar for app (collapsible). Top sticky header for landing page.

Professional woman smiling. Use for HR Manager testimonial.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. UPDATE THEME: Modify 'client/src/index.css' to implement the colors and fonts defined above. Use '@theme' block for Tailwind v4.
2. LANDING PAGE: Build a high-converting landing page at '/'. Use the 'hero' image and 'feature_workspace' image.
3. DASHBOARD: Refactor the dashboard to use the Bento Grid layout. Ensure stats cards are clear and actionable.
4. COMPONENTS: Customize Shadcn components in 'client/src/components/ui' to match the '0.5rem' radius and new colors.
5. MOBILE: Ensure all tables have horizontal scroll or card view on mobile.
6. ITALIAN: Ensure all visible text is in Italian (use Google Translate if needed, but keep it professional).
7. DARK MODE: Ensure the theme toggle works and colors map correctly.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add '.App { text-align: center; }'
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states.
Components MUST use named exports (export const ComponentName = ...)
Pages MUST use default exports (export default function PageName() {...})
All interactive elements MUST include 'data-testid' attribute
